enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Elisa Ferreira, Minister of the Environment and Natural Resources, said this Conference is the moment to confirm agreements and to reaffirm the political will to negotiate practical action.
She noted a number of measures currently underway in Portugal, and distinguished between the need for economic growth and the need to lower emissions.
At the bilateral level, her country will engage in many development projects designed to support the goals of the FCCC.
